In this video I try out the "Roll Maker" from Green Stuff World for the first time. This is a really interesting little device for creating a variety of tentacle, vine, and wire type shapes out of clay. Great for custom miniatures. 

You can grab your own set from www.greenstuffworld.com and use the following promo code to receive a discount on your order. 

PROMO CODE FOR %5 DISCOUNT: ‚ÄúBMCWINTER2019‚Äù (expires 31/03/2019)

Roll Maker: http://bit.ly/RollMaker
Roll Maker XL: http://bit.ly/RollMakerXL

Green Stuff World provided the product for me to review for free.
